message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this product for $100. As a valued customer, I want to assure you that this product is one of the many we have in stock. Since we've sold a total of 1 product so far, I'm confident that you'll love it!
I'll take it, but I'm only doing this because I'm the first buyer and I don't have any prior information to go on.

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in our product. Since our last buyer purchased the first product, I want to share with you that our overall sales rate is 80%. This means that 80% of our products are high-quality, and 20% are low-quality. With that in mind, I'm offering this product to you for $100. What do you think?
I'll take it, but I'm hoping it's high-quality!
